news_header: Several companies are set to report earnings on December 31, 2024, with notable forecasts and performance metrics.
news_original_title: Pre-Market Earnings Report for February 6, 2025 :  LLY, LIN, AZN, PM, HON, COP, BMY, ICE, TRI, APD, BDX, HLT
news_text: On February 6, 2025, various companies will report their earnings for the quarter ending December 31, 2024. Eli Lilly expects $5.10 EPS, a 104.82% increase. Linde forecasts $3.93 EPS, a 9.47% increase. AstraZeneca anticipates $1.07 EPS, a 46.58% increase. Philip Morris expects $1.51 EPS, an 11.03% increase. Honeywell forecasts $2.31 EPS, a decrease of 11.15%. ConocoPhillips anticipates $1.89 EPS, a decrease of 21.25%. Bristol-Myers Squibb expects $1.46 EPS, a decrease of 14.12%. Intercontinental Exchange forecasts $1.49 EPS, a 12.03% increase. Thomson Reuters anticipates $0.96 EPS, a decrease of 2.04%. Air Products expects $2.86 EPS, a 1.42% increase. Becton, Dickinson forecasts $2.98 EPS, an 11.19% increase. Hilton expects $1.68 EPS, unchanged from last year.
